trans-unit.source: Serves as the abstract base class for HTML server controls that map to HTML elements that are required to have an opening and a closing tag.
trans-unit.target: Serve como a classe base abstrata para controles de servidor HTML que são mapeados para elementos HTML que são necessários para ter uma abertura e uma marca de fechamento.

trans-unit.source: The most common controls with a closing tag are the `<form>`, `<table>`, `<tr>`, `<td>`, `<a>`, and `<span>` elements.
trans-unit.target: Os controles mais comuns com uma marca de fechamento são o `<form>`, `<table>`, `<tr>`, `<td>`, `<a>`, e `<span>` elementos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerHtml%2A> properties allow you to manipulate the content between the opening and closing tags of HtmlContainerControl-derived controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerText%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerHtml%2A>propriedades permitem que você manipule o conteúdo entre as marcas de abertura e fechamento de controles derivados HtmlContainerControl.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerText%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlContainerControl, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista de valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de HtmlContainerControl, consulte o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of this class is not created directly.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância dessa classe não é criada diretamente.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > If you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerHtml%2A> property to specify the text between the opening and closing tags of an HTML server control, the text is not HTML encoded.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Se você usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerHtml%2A>propriedade para especificar o texto entre as marcas de abertura e fechamento de um controle de servidor HTML, o texto não está codificada em HTML.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible to embed script within HTML tags in the text.
trans-unit.target: Isso torna possível inserir o script dentro de marcas HTML no texto.

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerHtml%2A> property, be sure to validate the value to reduce security vulnerabilities.
trans-unit.target: Ao usar o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerHtml%2A>propriedade, certifique-se de validar o valor para reduzir as vulnerabilidades de segurança.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerText%2A> property instead.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, considere o uso de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerText%2A>propriedade em vez disso.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl"></xref> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl"> </xref> classe usando valores padrão.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl> class using default values.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>classe usando valores padrão.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An instance of this class is not created directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Uma instância dessa classe não é criada diretamente.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called from the constructor of other HTML control classes to initialize properties defined in this class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é chamado a partir do construtor de outras classes de controle HTML para inicializar propriedades definidas nesta classe.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>|The "span" literal string.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>| A cadeia de caracteres de literal "estender". |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl"></xref> class using the specified tag name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl"> </xref> classe usando o nome da marca especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl> class using the specified tag.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar e inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>classe usando a marca especificada.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > An instance of this class is not created directly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Uma instância dessa classe não é criada diretamente.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called from the constructor of other HTML control classes to initialize properties defined in this class.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é chamado a partir do construtor de outras classes de controle HTML para inicializar propriedades definidas nesta classe.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>|The value specified by the `tag` parameter.|
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>| O valor especificado pelo `tag` parâmetro. |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.TagName%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the tag name of the control.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que especifica o nome da marca do controle.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object to hold the child controls (both literal and server) of the server control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> objeto para manter os controles filho (literal e servidor) do controle do servidor.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl"></xref> child server controls.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref> que contém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl"> </xref> controles de servidor filho.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content found between the opening and closing tags of the specified HTML server control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o conteúdo localizado entre as marcas de abertura e fechamento do controle de servidor HTML especificado.

trans-unit.source: The HTML content between opening and closing tags of an HTML server control.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo HTML entre as marcas de um controle de servidor HTML abertura e fechamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text between the opening and closing tags of the specified HTML server control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto entre as marcas de abertura e fechamento do controle de servidor HTML especificado.

trans-unit.source: The text between the opening and closing tags of an HTML server control.
trans-unit.target: O texto entre as marcas de abertura e fechamento de um controle de servidor HTML.

trans-unit.source: Restores the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl"></xref> control's view state from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState*> method.
trans-unit.target: Restaura o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl"> </xref> exibição de controle solicitação de estado de uma página anterior que foi salvo o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState*>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.SaveViewState*>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado basicamente pela infraestrutura do .NET Framework e não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, os desenvolvedores de controle podem substituir este método para especificar como um controle de servidor personalizado restaura o estado de exibição.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [visão geral do gerenciamento de estado ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method calls the base class's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método LoadViewState chama a classe base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.LoadViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the LoadViewState method sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerHtml%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, o método LoadViewState define o <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerHtml%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.InnerHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que representa o estado de controle a ser restaurado.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl"></xref> control to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl"> </xref> controle especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The Render method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to render the opening tag, child controls, and closing tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl> control.
trans-unit.target: Substitui o método de renderização de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para processar a marca de abertura, controles filho e de uma marca de fechamento a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlControl.Render%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Render method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl> control.
trans-unit.target: O método de renderização é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl"></xref> content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que recebe o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl"> </xref> conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl"></xref> control's attributes to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl"> </xref> atributos do controle especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> instance that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> instância que recebe o conteúdo renderizado.

trans-unit.source: Renders the closing tag for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl"></xref> control to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza a marca de fechamento para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl"> </xref> controle especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The RenderEndTag method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.Render%2A> method to render the closing tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl> control.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderEndTag é chamado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.Render%2A>método para renderizar a marcação de fechamento do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RenderEndTag method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl> control.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderEndTag é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle estender a funcionalidade do <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the rendered content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que recebe o conteúdo renderizado.
